Cycle of accounting periods: Jan-Mar, Apr-Jun, Jul-Sep, Oct-Dec (for businesses with financial year ending Mar, Jun, Sep or Dec)
Feb-Apr, May-Jul, Aug-Oct, Nov-Jan (for businesses with financial year ending Jan, Apr, Jul or Oct)
Mar-May, Jun-Aug, Sep-Nov, Dec-Feb (for businesses with financial year ending Feb, May, Aug or Nov)
